items.title: Ukraine and Russia exchange 780 soldiers and civilians in biggest swap
items.description: The handover of 390 soldiers and civilians on both sides is the largest since the start of the full-scale war.

items.title: Trump threatens 50% tariffs on EU and 25% on iPhones
items.description: Shares in the US and Europe fall after the US president says trade talks with the EU are "going nowhere".

items.title: South Africa crime statistics debunk 'white genocide' claims - minister
items.description: Of the six most recent victims of farm killings, five were black and one white, the latest figures show.

items.title: Russian survivor of Leningrad Siege fined for anti-war protest
items.description: Lyudmila Vasilyeva is fined for "discrediting" the Russian army after calling for an end to Moscow's war in Ukraine.

items.title: Harvard sues Trump administration for blocking foreign student enrolment
items.description: It comes a day after the administration said it had revoked Harvard's access to student visa programmes.
